channel.title: Need Hoster?---Arrisscape---
channel.description:
Need a Hoster who is trustworthy if this is not right thread MOD please move it not lock...thank you
Name---Arrisscape Highly edited--dicoscape Currenty working on adding arrissland i would host this myself but it will not let people join for somereason I will send you the files threw AIM so if your interested leave me your AIM sn and i will add you
Plenty of commands and pimpscape source
Also I will be editing the source more and more so when i do this and it is aq massive update... copy all the character files and more info files to the new folder i will send you thru aim with the updates.. You may change things if you want but like i said i will be updating it myself..UNless i like your updates so much do not give out the source file as it has alot of work and i do not want it realesed yet.. You may make yourself have owner status just do not spawn anything for anyone i will have drop partys realising about 30 rares in the game this is to keep the econemy up.
